items: ALINA CONSTANTINESCU - Interactive Creative Director / 14+ years agency experience / team lead & hands-on Born in Bucharest into a family with Greek and Romanian roots, I studied at the prestigious National University of Arts where I achieved a BA with honors in Sculpture and Ceramics. Following undergrad—and two more years of crypto-bohemian life in Paris struggling as a fine artist—I moved to London. Beside the grim weather and the most insipid of the European kitchens England offered me a greater focus on commercial art and an MA in Interactive Design from University College of London. After burning the midnight oil at a variety of London-based ad agencies—from designing for Saatchi, Deep End, and Poppe Tyson, to leading Interactive One—I eventually crossed the Atlantic and settled in New York City. Since then I worked at Ogilvy, JWT, Wunderman, McCann, and Renegade, on a host of global accounts: MTV, Wyeth, Symantec, LLBean, Microsoft, Panasonic, CitiBank, Diamond Trading Company, Pfizer, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania… STRENGTHS Core Experience: Design Principles, Brand Development /Management, Team Building /Management, Product Development. Software: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Quark, Flash, After Effects, Premiere, HTML, CSS, Java Script, Shockwave. Foreign Languages: Fluent Romanian, conversational Italian, conversational French, conversational Spanish, basic Russian. CAREER Creative Director / Consultant – 04.2008 / Present Global; NYC Accounts: Lufthansa, Thailand Board of Tourism. Creative Director – 04.2007 / 04.2008 Ripple Effects Interactive; Pittsburgh, Philadelphia, NYC Accounts: Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Google Earth, The Ad Council, Carnegie Mellon University, MS Society, NCSU. Associate Creative Director – 03.2006 / 04.2007 Ogilvy Interactive; NYC Account: Wyeth Pharmaceuticals. Permalance Associate Creative Director – 12.2005 / Present Night Agency; NYC Accounts: United Nations, MTV, Symantec, HSBC, Sony. Senior Art Director – 11.2005 / 03.2006 J Walter Thompson; NYC Accounts: Diamond Trading Company, LL Bean. Art Director – 10.2004 / 11.2005 Young & Rubicam Brands / Wunderman; NYC Accounts: Microsoft, Pfizer, CitiBank. Senior Art Director – 02 / 10.2004 McCann Erickson / Zentropy; NYC Accounts: Chase, Universal Studios, Maybelline. Senior Art Director – 01.2003 / 02.2004 Renegade Marketing Group; NYC Accounts: Panasonic, New York City Department of Education. Creative Director – 11.2001 / 01.2003 Igames Publishing; NYC Accounts: DMA, S2Games, Savage Games. Associate Creative Director – 03.1999 / 11.2001 Comet Systems; NYC Accounts: Warner Brothers, Comedy Central, Yahoo!, IBM, AT&T, Disney, Orbitz, Overture, Houghton-Mifflin. Creative Director – 11.1997 / 01.1999 Interactive One; London Accounts: BBC, MTV, Barclays Capital, Volvo, Shell, Nasdaq, BMW, HSBC. Associate Creative Director – 05 / 09.1997 Poppe Tyson; London Accounts: EIDOS, Daily Star Editorials, IBM, Coopers & Lybrand, Plaid, Hewlett Packard, Granada Media. Art Director – 01.1996 / 05.1997 Deep End Design; London Accounts: Universal Rights, EMI, Rapido TV, Creative Review. Graphic Designer – 08.1992 / 12.1995 Saatchi & Saatchi / Red Kite; London Accounts: Sanatogen, Polygram, Audi, Channel 4, Blue Studios, Encarta, Hewlett Packard. LIVE URLS Multiple Sclerosis Society: Join The Movement Wyeth Pharmaceuticals: Know Menopause Carnegie Mellon University: CMU.com, Tepper School of Business Bruster's Real Ice Cream: Come Parfait With Me Symantec: Safety Town, Rock Dot Rock Lucky Brand Jeans: Denim Highway Commonwealth of Pennsylvania: VisitPA.com, Groundhog Crossing Panasonic: Life Box Diamond Trading Company: Journey, Valentine’s Day 2006 Promo MTV: the2headeddog.nightagency.com, mtv2.mtv.com/mtv2/ontv/atr/#/mtv2/ontv/atr, vmanyc2006.com, bestmusiconcampus.com Vanderbilt University: Owen School of Law Giant Step: giantstep.net Soda: sodarace.net/index.jsp Maybelline: maybelline.com
